What a waste of time. You're an idiot.

GUYS- all you need to do is a simple crack!
step by step instructions below -

1. Download a free app from the Mac App Store, I used Twitter... YOU MUST DOWNLOAD IT FROM THE STORE. You need NEED NEED to download it with your iTunes Account. D/Ling one from somewhere else WILL NOT WORK.
2. Go to finder- and go to the Applications folder, locate and right click on Twitter and then select Show Package Contents.
 3. Navigate to Contents folder and copy _CodeSignature, _MASReceipt and CodeResources.


4. Drag the GTA app into Applications folder.
5. Right click on the GTA app and select Show Package Contents.
6. Navigate to Contents folder and delete _CodeSignature, _MASReceipt and CodeResources.
7. Paste in the files that been copied from the Twitter.app.

BOOM IT WORKS.
